assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Y.A.C. Holdings Co., Ltd. provides mechatronics, display, industrial machinery, and electronics related products in Japan and internationally. It offers burnishers; LEDs, semiconductor classifiers, taping machines, LED classifiers, and embossed carrier tapes; slicing and dicing machines; laser anneal and drilling machines; ion beam milling and spattering equipment; and precision polishers, dust conveyers, automatic transfer systems, chip handlers, wafer handling tools, and appearance inspection machines. The company also designs, manufactures, sells, and maintains automatic packaging equipment; and provides display flat panels, such as LEDs and OELs. In addition, it offers shirt finishing systems, wool and uniform finishers, tumblers, bagging systems, sorters, and apparel equipment for clothing; dry etching and barrel plasma ashing systems; and UV curing machines, hard disk conveyors, conveyor/handling/automatic machines, handlers, pogo-pin insertion machines, converor and bagging machines, factory automation equipment, solar water and cell manufacturing tools, and research and development tools. Further, the company provides electronics related equipment, including electric power related measuring and control communication equipment, and heater and medical equipment. Y.A.C. Holdings Co., Ltd. was formerly known as Y.A.C. Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Y.A.C. Holdings Co., Ltd. in April 2017. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Akishima, Japan.
